segments.text: Hello , have you made a reservation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , are there any vacant beds for us ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course.How do you like your room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just an ordinary one , six people living in a room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , how long are you staying ?
segments.speaker: S1
